title: Company Formation - Mainland
content:
Mainland company formation allows businesses to operate anywhere in the UAE without restrictions. Key features:

**Requirements:**
- Local sponsor (51% ownership) or 100% foreign ownership for eligible activities
- Minimum capital varies by activity
- Office space requirement

**Timeline:** 2-4 weeks

**Key Benefits:**
- Trade anywhere in UAE
- No restrictions on number of visas
- Government contracts eligible

title: Free Zone Company Setup
content:
Free zones offer 100% foreign ownership and tax benefits. Popular free zones include DMCC, JAFZA, IFZA.

**Benefits:**
- 100% foreign ownership
- 0% corporate tax (subject to conditions)
- 100% repatriation of capital and profits
- No currency restrictions

**Limitations:**
- Cannot trade directly in UAE mainland
- Limited to specified activities

title: PRO Services Guide
content:
PRO (Public Relations Officer) services handle all government-related documentation.

**Services Include:**
- Visa processing (employment, investor, family)
- Emirates ID application
- Medical fitness test coordination
- Document attestation
- License renewals

**Processing Times:**
- Employment visa: 3-5 working days
- Emirates ID: 5-7 working days

title: Pricing Guide 2024
content:
**Mainland LLC:**
- Government fees: AED 15,000 - 25,000
- Service fee: AED 10,000

**Free Zone (DMCC):**
- License: AED 20,000
- Registration: AED 8,000
- Service fee: AED 7,000

**PRO Services:**
- Per visa: AED 2,500
- Package (5 visas): AED 10,000

*All prices subject to change. Confirm with management for custom quotes.*
